text: Alison Sherwood is an American journalist. She won a 2011 Pulitzer Prize for Explanatory Reporting. She works for the Milwaukee Journal Sentinel. She studied at the University of Missouri. In 2016, she participated in the Journalists in the Community program, sponsored by the Wisconsin Humanities Council. == References == == Other websites == * knights-of-the-golden-quill * kathleen-gallagher-and-mark-johnson , nieman reports Category:American journalists Category:Pulitzer Prize winners Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Alison Sherwood
